mapper.select: SELECT DATE(created_at) AS date, COUNT(user_id) AS count FROM user GROUP BY DATE(created_at) ORDER BY DATE(created_at) ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - LEFT(birth, 4)) < 20 THEN '20세 이하' WHEN (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - LEFT(birth, 4)) BETWEEN 20 AND 29 THEN '20세-29세' WHEN (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - LEFT(birth, 4)) BETWEEN 30 AND 39 THEN '30세-39세' WHEN (YEAR(CURRENT_DATE) - LEFT(birth, 4)) BETWEEN 40 AND 49 THEN '40세-49세' ELSE '50세 이상' END AS ageGroup, COUNT(user_id) AS count FROM user GROUP BY ageGroup
SELECT gender, COUNT(user_id) AS count FROM user GROUP BY gender ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT user_id AS userId, PASSWORD, NAME, phone_number AS phoneNumber, email, birth, gender, created_at AS createdAt FROM user ORDER BY created_at ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE class SET class_permit = #{permitStatus} WHERE class_id = #{classId}
UPDATE class SET class_permit = 'n', reject_message = #{rejectMessage} WHERE class_id = #{classId}
